casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Glenwood Earl DOWNEY 85A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 10, 2017 Michele Goldman, Attorney at Law, for Downey, Glenwood Earl. Richard E. Slipsky, Special Deputy Attorney General, Scott T. Stroud, Special Deputy Attorney General, Susan I. Doyle, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 10th of May 2017 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th of May 2017."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 23rd day of May 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
